main module¶

main web-based game.

main.placement_interface()¶

Represents the /placement url. GET requests render the template, POST requests redirect to the / url.

main.process_attack()¶
main.root()¶

Represents the / url. GET requests render main.html, POST requests are not defined.

ECM1400 battleships
